LanguageData.ARA_Cleaning.label: cleaning
LanguageData.ARA_Cleaning.description: It allows this creature to carry out scavenging tasks.
LanguageData.ARA_Sowing.label: cultivation
LanguageData.ARA_Sowing.description: It allows this organism to carry out cultivation tasks.
LanguageData.ARA_Slayer_Ability1_Train.label: violent clash
LanguageData.ARA_Slayer_Ability1_Train.description: It charges at the target with its huge body, damaging everything in its path.The longer the distance it moves while charging, the more damage it deals.
